Subject: Update passwords in StealthAudit
Description: Working through ticket #416001, Dawan advised that they need to update the password to their StealthAudit service account, and update it in the applications to have no downtime.
What_We_Know__c: The customer needs to know how to update the password for the Stealthbits application after changing the password from AD.
Solution_Comment__c:
I went to every location where the customer needs to update the password for your service account once it has been reset from your AD.

Update Service Account Password Upon Password Change in Active Directory (AD)
https://helpcenter.netwrix.com/bundle/z-kb-articles-salesforce/page/kA04u0000000IKbCAM.html
